name: Bark
flavor: The Bark Stance controls wood, allowing them to push the limits of wooden weapons and shift the shape of wood at-will.

name: Growth
flavor: By manipulating local plantlife, Growth techniques can turn a barren field into one choked with aggressive, hostile plantlife.

name: Root
flavor: Those that learn the Root arts can pull stamina from plants and others, using it to bolster their own.

name: Bloom
flavor: The Bloom Stance is one of the most beloved of the Wood Disciplines, as it can spark joy and happiness in themselves and others.

name: Mindrot
flavor: Mindrotters beguile the senses, creating false sensations that seem more true than reality itself.
